name: The Blocks Returneth
description:
Reach as high as you can! Features an online leaderboard.

A loving tribute to The Blocks Cometh by Halfbot. I always thought the game could have used an extra dimension. Now in glorious 64 x 64. Made in LOWREZJAM 2020.

I'll treat a pizza to the first place in the leaderboard when the jam voting period ends at August 24th. Please take a screenshot of your score for proof.

Controls: 

Space : jump, WASD : move

Mouse : aim/shoot

P : pause, C : change camera

The default camera moves between third person and first person, alternative camera is pure first-person.

Tips:

Be mindful of shadows

Wall jump is OP

Credits:

The music was made by artnn!

Special thanks to Brass Harpooner for his online leader board backend at SilentWolf and Jack Oatley for the font.
